str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
As often as, as many times as. Multiple adverb from hos; how many times as.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.
Bread, a loaf, food. From airo; bread or a loaf.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A drinking cup, the contents of the cup; fig: the portion which God allots.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To declare openly, proclaim, preach, laud, celebrate. From kata and the base of aggelos; to proclaim, promulgate.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.
As far as, up to, until, during. Or achris akh'-rece; akin to akron; until or up to.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
